config.html: Written by Antoine Caron who lives and works in Lyon (France) building useful things at Bedrock. You should follow him on Twitter. Take a look at my friends websites. You could also take a look at the conferences I gave. If you want to see my professional background, my resume is available here.

markdownRemark.html:
Like last year, I am taking part in the advent of code 2021. All my solution are opensource and free to reuse. I am doing it in Javascript this year too.

Impossible is not JS !

Take a look at https://github.com/Slashgear/advent-of-code

Project is a lerna monorepo structure showing solution by years and days.

packages/
  2019/
    day-1/
      ..
    day-2/
      ..
  2021/
     day-1/
      ..
    day-2/
      ..
    day-3/
      ..
    day-4/
      ..
  ..

For now, you can find solution for:

  • 2021 day 1
  • 2021 day 2
  • 2021 day 3
  • 2021 day 4
